section.name: Filter alignments step
section.p: This step allow to filter the output alignments in SAM format.

WARNING : the filters order in the parameter file is not trivial. The output file of this step is the same, regardless the filters order. Nevertheless, informations in the log file depend of the filters order.

ul.li: Available: Both local and distributed mode
Input: alignments in SAM format (e.g. mapper_results__1.sam)
Output: filtered alignments in SAM format (e.g. filtered_mapper_results_1.sam)

tr.td: Define the number of threads to use in local mode.
Define the maximum number of threads to use in local mode.
Threshold for the mapping quality. An integer between [0-255]. This filter is based on the MAPQ field of SAM format specification.
Remove all alignments of a multi-matches read if true.
Keep only the first alignment of a multi-matches read if true.
Keep the given number of the first alignments for a read.
Keep alignments of a read according to the distance of the read from the reference sequence on the genome. This filter is useful to detect SNP and indel.
Threshold for the mapping quality. An integer between [0-255]. This filter is based on the MAPQ field of SAM format specification.
